antiAging.title: Anti-Aging Serum
antiAging.description: A premium anti-aging serum targeting fine lines and wrinkles for women 35-50. Should contain retinol or retinol alternatives, hyaluronic acid for hydration, and peptides for skin firmness. Lightweight texture that absorbs quickly. Clean, clinical packaging preferred.

cleanser.title: Natural Face Cleanser
cleanser.description: Gentle foam cleanser for sensitive skin with 100% natural ingredients only. Should remove makeup and impurities without stripping the skin. Include soothing botanicals like chamomile or aloe vera. pH balanced formula. Eco-friendly packaging.

moisturizer.title: Hydrating Moisturizer
moisturizer.description: 24-hour moisture lock formula for dry and dehydrated skin. Should contain ceramides for barrier repair, niacinamide for pore refinement, and squalane for deep hydration. Non-greasy finish suitable for day and night use.
